node.statement: PART 1 (Well-definedness and SUSY): The q-deformed supercharge Q_q, constructed by replacing Wigner 3j symbols with quantum 3j symbols of U_q(su(2)) in the BLM supercharge, satisfies (Q_q)^2 = 0 and (Q_q^dagger)^2 = 0 for all q > 0 real. Consequently H_q = {Q_q, Q_q^dagger} is a well-defined, positive semi-definite Hamiltonian with N=2 supersymmetry.
